favourite.article: Daily increasing the growth of life in me!
This water/waters flows us into the New Jerusalem to consummate the ages. Praise the Lord we are in His flow. Lord Jesus we love You.

Ezekiel 47:5 - "Then He measured a thousand cubits, and it was a river that I could not pass through; for the water had risen, enough water to swim in, a river that could not be crossed." Hallelujah, we have not just a trickle but we have RIVERS to swim in! In this great flow, we can struggle all we want, but eventually this life flow will limit and restrict us until all we can do is to drink and enjoy this living water!
What a very enjoyable hymn! Hallelujah! Drink the living water! Rivers flowing free! The church life is a life-flow from which we never roam.

Amen! Oh what grace that these waters are flowing FREE! Waters! Living waters! Have Your way in me! Daily increasing the growth of life in me, for His glorius building and His recovery! Oh Lord Jesus!
It's life giving and it's life flowing. Praise God!
What a rich picture in the Old Testament! And so applicable in the New Testament economy of God! Thank You Lord, increase Your flowing in us! This is the way He deals with our soul-life. Hallelujah!
Let's all swim in and drink the river of life! Hallelujah! :)
